QuestData.Title: Curbing the Plague
QuestData.Description: You've proven your worth as an ally, $n. I need you to continue your task and track down more plagued wildlife. This time seek out some of the more dangerous beasts. Hunt the spindleweb lurkers west of the Dead Scar and the vampiric mistbats just south of here. Return to me when you're done.
QuestData.LogDescription: Farstrider Sedina at the Farstrider Enclave in the Ghostlands wants you to slay 8 Spindleweb Lurkers and 10 Vampiric Mistbats.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you completed the task I asked of you, $N?
QuestData.RewardText: You've taken your task seriously and thus I'd like to present you with suitable rewards. We need more allies with your courage and determination, $N.
